title: Google\Cloud\DataFusion\V1\UpdateInstanceRequest
name: UpdateInstanceRequest
description:
Request message for updating a Data Fusion instance.

Data Fusion allows updating the labels, options, and stack driver settings. This is also used for CDF version upgrade.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datafusion.v1.UpdateInstanceRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instance
params.description: Required. The instance resource that replaces the resource on the server. Currently, Data Fusion only allows replacing labels, options, and stack driver settings. All other fields will be ignored.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Field mask is used to specify the fields that the update will overwrite in an instance resource. The fields specified in the update_mask are relative to the resource, not the full request. A field will be overwritten if it is in the mask. If the user does not provide a mask, all the supported fields (labels, options, and version currently) will be overwritten.
